h3.div: ALERT: All PRB Schools are doing Distance Learning : March 30th - May 28th

div.p: May 1st - May 4th No Distance Learning for Students . Meals will still be delivered and childcare will continue as normal during these days.

p.em: School doors will be locked. Please call ahead to the office if you need to visit the school. Our distance learning plan is available here.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;
touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: The School Board of Pine River-Backus Schools is conducting a search for a new superintendent. The school board contracted with the Minnesota School Boards Association (MSBA) to provide guidance and assist with the search.
The application deadline for this position is April 26, 2020, and the new superintendent will begin work in the district on July 1, 2020.
Please click here for the position Vacancy Announcement.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: The TigerDen Food Pantry is Open and Stocked

div.p: The Tiger Den Food Pantry is fully stocked and ready for any families experiencing food insecurities. Please call 218-587-8000 to set up an appointment to get curbside service for a box of food for your family.
Thank you to the Pine River-Backus Food Shelf, Second Harvest, The Outreach of Brainerd Lakes, The Warehouse and all the folks who have graciously donated to support this initiative. #PRBStrong

div.p: If you would like to share kudos or concerns relating to anything at Pine River-Backus Schools, please fill out our comments form. We value your feedback!

Site content available in alternate formats if requested. Call 218.587.8000
